questions.question: Do you plan to vote in the 1996 elections?
Concerning issues of importance, how would you prefer to contact your elected officials?
Have you written a letter to the editor of your local newspaper about issues of importance to you?
If no, would you be willing to write a letter to the editor of your local newspaper?
Do you have access to on-line or Internet services?
On which of the topics below would you most likely voice your opinion to elected officials?
topics: Government regulations of tobacco sales and use
Smoking restrictions/bans in public places, restaurants or workplaces

questions.question: Do you receive the Smokers Advocate newsletter about issues concerning smokers' rights?
If no, would you like to receive this free newsletter?
